T02D2942:16a-1: badzra bi d'a ra na mandal bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2942:16a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2942:16a-4: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:16a-5: sdug bsngal la sogs dag par mdzad pa ste //
T02D2942:16a-6: rnam par 'joms pa khro bo rnams kyi rje btsun nyid //
T02D2942:16b-0: dpal ldan @16b yid khros log lta gcod pa'i dpal //
T02D2942:16b-1: rdo rje bsnams pa las 'joms 'jigs byed pa'i //
T02D2942:16b-2: le'u'i grangs la nges pa'i snying po ste //
T02D2942:16b-3: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa bar 'di gsungs thog ma'o //
T02D2942:16b-4: de nyid dkyil 'khor cho ga las kyi rim pa nyid //
T02D2942:16b-5: 'di nyid du ni rnam par bshad par bya'o//
T02D2942:16b-6: sa yi cho ga go rims ltar //
T02D2942:16b-7: gzhan gyi las kyi rim par dbye //
T02D2942:16b-8: sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi la //
T02D2942:16b-9: phyogs mtshams ma nor legs par mnyam //
T02D2942:16b-10: 'khrul ba med pa'i blo yis bya //
T02D2942:16b-11: dpangs su chag gang brtsig par bya //
T02D2942:16b-12: srad bu mnyam ldan sum sgril la //
T02D2942:16b-13: byin gyis brlabs te g-yas nas gdab //
T02D2942:16b-14: cha chen cha bran mkhas pas dbye //
T02D2942:16b-15: tshon sna lnga yi phye ma la /
T02D2942:16b-16: byin gyis brlabs la legs par dgod //
T02D2942:16b-18: gnyis pa'i cha la 'khor lo brgyad //
T02D2942:16b-19: mu khyud rdo rje'i rab dang //
T02D2942:16b-20: gru chad snam bu gnyis pa dang //
T02D2942:16b-21: sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bri //
T02D2942:16b-22: de nyid kha dog nges par ni //
T02D2942:16b-24: mu khyud bzhi pa dkar po la //
T02D2942:16b-25: rdo rje rnams ni lcags dang mtshungs //
T02D2942:16b-26: gru chad gnyis ni ljang gu la //
T02D2942:16b-27: snam bu dang po ser po ste //
T02D2942:16b-28: de bzhin gnyis pa dkar po che //
T02D2942:16b-29: sgo bzhi so so'i rigs dang sbyar //
T02D2942:16b-30: lha rnams so so'i phyag mtshan ni //
T02D2942:16b-31: so so'i gnas su dgod par bya //
T02D2942:16b-32: de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2942:16b-33: dgos pa dag ni tshang ba la //
T02D2942:16b-34: dkyil 'khor grub pa'i rdzas nyid ni //
T02D2942:16b-35: seng ldeng phur ba sor brgyad pa //
T02D2942:16b-36: bzhi pa phyogs kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D2942:16b-37: dkyil 'khor gyi ni ngos bzhir gdab //
T02D2942:16b-38: tshon sna lnga yi skud pas sbrel //
T02D2942:16b-39: gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa nyid //
T02D2942:16b-40: tshad dang ldan pa dag pa la //
T02D2942:16b-41: gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang //
T02D2942:16b-43: kha rgyan ldan pa lnga nyid la //
T02D2942:16b-44: so so'i mtshan ma btab la gzhag / las kyi bum pa sna tshogs pa'i ;
T02D2942:16b-45: / rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no //
T02D2942:16b-46: sgrub po bdag nyid mdun du yang //
T02D2942:16b-47: mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham //
T02D2942:16b-48: nya dang bu ram sran chung 'bras //
T02D2942:16b-49: khre dang tshe la sogs pa yi //
T02D2942:16b-50: gtor ma gsum ni g-yas na gzhag / de nas phyi nang khrus byas te //
T02D2942:16b-51: gtsang ma'i gos ni rab gon la //
T02D2942:17a-0: @17a * // dri zhim zas ni mur bzhin du //
T02D2942:17a-1: sems bskyed pas ni gzhan don mchog / bdun po yongs su dag par bya'o //
T02D2942:17a-2: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo nyid //
T02D2942:17a-3: ji ltar dmigs pa mkhas pas sgom //
T02D2942:17a-4: dri chab byin gyis brlabs la gzhag / h'um h'um zhes pas rngam pa dang //
T02D2942:17a-5: aom badzra raksha raksha h'um h'um zhes pas /
T02D2942:17a-6: g-yas brkyang ba yi gar gyis ni //
T02D2942:17a-7: g-yon brkyang stabs kyis g-yon nas bskor //
T02D2942:17a-8: bgegs rnams bskrad ba'i sbyor pa bya //
T02D2942:17a-9: phyogs bcur khro bo ti ra yi //
T02D2942:17a-10: nga rgyal ldan pas bsrung dang bcings / mtshams la sogs pa mkhas pas bshad //
T02D2942:17a-11: de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni //
T02D2942:17a-12: dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba'i steng //
T02D2942:17a-14: mchod dang don gnyis rdzogs par byas //
T02D2942:17a-15: 'dus pas gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni //
T02D2942:17a-16: sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med //
T02D2942:17a-17: dbus su rnam par bsam par bya //
T02D2942:17a-18: de rjes sngags 'di rnam par brjod ;
T02D2942:17a-19: / na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D2942:17a-20: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D2942:17a-21: bha ku la bi sho dha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17a-22: zhes pa lan gsum brjod pa yis //
T02D2942:17a-24: de nyid dam tshig phyag rgya ni //
T02D2942:17a-25: lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las //
T02D2942:17a-26: gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas bsgreng //
T02D2942:17a-27: gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2942:17a-28: gsang sngags 'di ni legs par ni //
T02D2942:17a-29: byang shar mtshams su gshin rje'o //
T02D2942:17a-30: aom ya m'anta k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17a-31: yang snying lag gnyis sor mo dgod //
T02D2942:17a-32: snying gar rtse mo sprad pa yang //
T02D2942:17a-34: zhes pas shar du mtha' yas bskyed //
T02D2942:17a-35: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa //
T02D2942:17a-36: g-yas pa nu ma'i thad kar bzung //
T02D2942:17a-37: aom aa mri te ba re h'um /
T02D2942:17a-38: zhes pas shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed //
T02D2942:17a-39: lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las //
T02D2942:17a-40: g-yon pa'i mthe bong sprel byas la //
T02D2942:17a-41: aom sumbha ni ki ra bandha ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17a-42: zhes pas lho ru gnod mdzes bskyed //
T02D2942:17a-43: lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las //
T02D2942:17a-44: mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag mnan //
T02D2942:17a-45: gung mo sor mo mthe'u chung bsgreng //
T02D2942:17a-46: aom bhi na ste badzra kro dha na kro dha sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17a-47: zhes pas lho nub sngon mthong bskyed //
T02D2942:17a-48: snga ma'i phyag rgya lta bu la /
T02D2942:17a-49: aom hya gr'i ba sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17a-50: zhes pas nub tu rta mgrin bskyed //
T02D2942:17b-0: g-yon @17b pa'i khu tshur bcangs ba las //
T02D2942:17b-1: g-yas ba'i khu tshur gnyis bsgrengs la //
T02D2942:17b-2: aom aa ba ra dzi ta sa ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17b-3: zhes pas nub byang gzhan gyis me thub bskyed //
T02D2942:17b-4: lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las //
T02D2942:17b-5: mthe bong mthe'u chung gung mo ni //
T02D2942:17b-6: gshibs te so sor bsgreng byas la //
T02D2942:17b-7: aom badzra p'a ni b'an pa ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17b-8: zhes byas byang du gtum po'o //
T02D2942:17b-9: de nas so so'i phyag rgya bskyed //
T02D2942:17b-10: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa dang //
T02D2942:17b-11: g-yas pa bcangs te spyi bor gzhag / lag gnyis khu tshur snying gar brtsegs //
T02D2942:17b-12: g-yas ba'i mthe'u chung g-yon pas bcangs //
T02D2942:17b-13: lag gnyis brdebs pa'i tshul du bya //
T02D2942:17b-14: de ltar rim pa nges pa yis //
T02D2942:17b-15: gru chad la ni go rims bzhin //
T02D2942:17b-16: sngags 'dis rgyal chen bzhi rim par gsal bar bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2942:17b-17: aom dhri ta r'asht'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17b-18: aom bi r'u dha k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17b-19: aom bi r'u paksha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17b-20: aom bee shra ba n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:17b-21: zhes pa rgyal po bzhi ru bskyed //
T02D2942:17b-22: de yi phyi rim snam bu la //
T02D2942:17b-23: bkra shes lha mo brgyad po'o //
T02D2942:17b-24: de yi phyi rim snam bu la //
T02D2942:17b-25: phyogs skyong ba ni de bzhin no //
T02D2942:17b-26: sgo bzhin sgo ma gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2942:17b-27: de dag sku mdog phyag mtshan ni //
T02D2942:17b-28: gtso bo'i sku mdog ljang ser la //
T02D2942:17b-29: g-yas brgya gram phyogs de ni //
T02D2942:17b-30: thugs kar bzung ste g-yon pa yang //
T02D2942:17b-31: bum pa dku la brten pa'o //
T02D2942:17b-32: yang na phyag gnyis bum pa ni //
T02D2942:17b-33: sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcad la //
T02D2942:17b-34: phyag gnyis bzung ste thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2942:17b-35: mtha' yas zhal gsum sku mdog mthing //
T02D2942:17b-36: phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la //
T02D2942:17b-37: g-yon gyi 'og mas rtse dgu ni ;
T02D2942:17b-39: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sku mdog dmar //
T02D2942:17b-40: zhal dang phyag gnyis sngar 'dra la //
T02D2942:17b-42: gnod mdzes mdog ser sngar bzhin la //
T02D2942:17b-44: mi g-yo ba ni ljang gu la //
T02D2942:17b-45: rdo rje dbyug tho thugs gar 'dzin //
T02D2942:17b-47: gzhan gyis mi thub sngon po la //
T02D2942:17b-49: gtum po smug nag rtse dgu 'dzin //
T02D2942:17b-50: gshin rje sngo nag zhal gsum pa //
T02D2942:17b-51: phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la //
T02D2942:18a-2: dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu la //
T02D2942:18a-3: be con pi wang chu srin dang //
T02D2942:18a-4: rin po che yi dong tse'o //
T02D2942:18a-5: lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni //
T02D2942:18a-6: gsal byed ma ni sngon mo la //
T02D2942:18a-7: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpal be'u 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-8: dbyangs can ma ni dkar mo la //
T02D2942:18a-11: 'od ldan mthing ga rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2942:18a-12: skyes chen dmar mo gdu bu 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-13: dri med pa ya dmar mo la //
T02D2942:18a-14: rang rtags g-yas pa bum pa 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-16: yid gzhungs ljang ser g-yung drung 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-17: phyogs skyong rnams kyi sku mdog ni //
T02D2942:18a-18: brgya byin dkar la rdo rje gdengs //
T02D2942:18a-19: me lha dmar po rin chen phreng //
T02D2942:18a-20: gshin rje mthing ga dbyug to bsnams //
T02D2942:18a-21: bden bral ljang gu ral gri'o //
T02D2942:18a-22: chu lha dmar po klu zhags bsnams //
T02D2942:18a-23: rlung lha dud ka be con 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-24: gnod sbyin ser po rin chen 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-25: dbang ldan dkar ser tri sh'u la //
T02D2942:18a-26: nyi zla dkar po au dumw'ar //
T02D2942:18a-27: sa yi lha ma ser mo la //
T02D2942:18a-28: phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams //
T02D2942:18a-29: sgo ma'i phyag mtshan sku mdog ni //
T02D2942:18a-30: lcags kyu dkar la lcags kyu 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-31: zhags pa sngo la de bzhin zhags //
T02D2942:18a-32: lcags sgro ga dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-33: dril bu ljang ser dril bu 'dzin //
T02D2942:18a-34: de ltar sku mdog gsal bsgoms la //
T02D2942:18a-35: ye shes dbang bskur dgug gzhug bstim //
T02D2942:18a-36: de ltar gzhal yas gsal dmigs la //
T02D2942:18a-37: snying po rgyas dang bsdus pa dang //
T02D2942:18a-38: shin tu bsdus pa gang mos la //
T02D2942:18a-39: brgya rtsa brgyad du dbul bar bya //
T02D2942:18a-40: rdo rjes mchod pa lnga yang dbul //
T02D2942:18a-41: bsnyen pa'i dus su dmigs pa gsum //
T02D2942:18a-42: legs par brtags te mnyes par bya //
T02D2942:18a-43: sgrub pa bum pa nyid la'o //
T02D2942:18a-44: de nas bstod pa dbul ba'i phyir //
T02D2942:18a-45: chos kyi dbyings nas lha rnams ni //
T02D2942:18a-46: spyan drangs bum pa'i nang du bstim //
T02D2942:18a-47: bskul tshig 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02D2942:18a-48: na mo sems ni rgya che mchog tu rab bskyed de //
T02D2942:18a-49: ma lus 'khor dang bcas te gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:18a-50: chos dbyings mngon 'gyur ye shes sku brnyes te //
T02D2942:18a-51: sku gsung thugs su legs par 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2942:18b-0: gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i @18b bka' ;
T02D2942:18b-1: / bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02D2942:18b-2: rnam dag dbyings kyi dam chos gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:18b-3: sa bcu'i rgyal tshab chos la mnga' brnyes shing //
T02D2942:18b-4: snying rje chen pos brtson 'grus go gyon pa //
T02D2942:18b-5: shes rab thabs kyis khams gsum 'dren mdzad pa //
T02D2942:18b-6: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:18b-8: dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas khang //
T02D2942:18b-9: bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams te //
T02D2942:18b-10: nyi zla padma'i gdan bshams nas //
T02D2942:18b-11: spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ba ni //
T02D2942:18b-12: bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das //
T02D2942:18b-13: nams kyang rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' ba'i //
T02D2942:18b-14: lus ngag yid gsum nyon mongs thams cad 'joms //
T02D2942:18b-15: 'gro 'dul thugs rjes byin rlabs bsam mi khyab //
T02D2942:18b-16: bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yang //
T02D2942:18b-17: 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:18b-18: sems can nyon mongs gshin rje'i dra ba la //
T02D2942:18b-19: ye shes thugs kyis gshed dang dra ba 'joms //
T02D2942:18b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa 'byung ba yi //
T02D2942:18b-21: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po yang //
T02D2942:18b-22: 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:18b-23: nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas thug pa bzhin ;
T02D2942:18b-24: /'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs mtha' yas la //
T02D2942:18b-25: thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprul pa mtha' yas kyis //
T02D2942:18b-26: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D2942:18b-27: khro bo'i rgyal po yon tan mtha' yas kyang //
T02D2942:18b-28: 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:18b-29: sems can dug gsum nad kyis gdungs pa la //
T02D2942:18b-30: thugs rje'i byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa //
T02D2942:18b-31: thabs la mkhas ba mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2942:18b-32: sems can ma lus dbyings su sbyor mdzad pa //
T02D2942:18b-33: khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi thab sbyor yang //
T02D2942:18b-34: 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:18b-35: rnam thar gsum gyi mnga' mdzad ye shes stobs //
T02D2942:18b-36: nyon mongs dug gsum ma lus gnon mdzad phyir //
T02D2942:18b-37: phyag mtshan rdo rje tho ba 'bar ba bsnams //
T02D2942:18b-38: mdzes pa'i sku mdog gdul thabs cir yang ston //
T02D2942:18b-39: khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes stobs po che //
T02D2942:19a-2: dbyings las mi g-yo 'khor ba'i mtha' mi g-yo //
T02D2942:19a-3: mtha' la mi gnas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad //
T02D2942:19a-4: mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i mtha' gcod cing //
T02D2942:19a-5: sems can rnams kyi dpal dang mgon gyur pa //
T02D2942:19a-6: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g-yo mgon po yang ;
T02D2942:19a-7: /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:19a-8: ye shes thugs kyi 'khor ba'i mtha' yi bar //
T02D2942:19a-9: thugs rje myur bas rta gdong phrin las mdzod //
T02D2942:19a-10: 'gro don mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar mnga' ba yang //
T02D2942:19a-11: rtag tu rta mgrin rgyal po gsung du sprul //
T02D2942:19a-12: khro bo'i rgyal po dbang gi rta gdong yang ;
T02D2942:19a-13: /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:19a-14: bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D2942:19a-15: mtha' gnyis ma yengs dbyings la dbang bsgyur zhing //
T02D2942:19a-16: thugs rjes phrin las dbyings su 'dus ma mdzad //
T02D2942:19a-17: sku yi yon tan rdzogs pas dbang phyug che //
T02D2942:19a-18: khro bo'i rgyal po dbang phyug gtum po yang //
T02D2942:19a-19: 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:19a-20: rin chen las grub ri rab ngos bzhi nas //
T02D2942:19a-21: bsod nams tshogs ldan dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi //
T02D2942:19a-22: gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la //
T02D2942:19a-23: ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du don mdzad pa'i //
T02D2942:19a-24: dpal ldan rgyal po chen po 'khor bcas kyang //
T02D2942:19a-25: 'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2942:19a-26: dus bzhi tshad med bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D2942:19a-27: mi 'jigs bzhi ldan ye shes tshogs rdzogs te //
T02D2942:19a-28: mchod pa mang po'i sprin dang bcas nas ni //
T02D2942:19a-29: mchod pa'i lha mo mang po gshegs su gsol//
T02D2942:19a-30: rdo rje dang ni rin chen padma dang //
T02D2942:19a-31: sna tshogs las grub rdo rje rgya gram 'bar //
T02D2942:19a-32: phyag rgya chen pos bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon //
T02D2942:19a-33: phyogs bzhi phyag rgya chen po gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19a-34: zhi ba dkar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D2942:19a-35: padma dkar po phyag na dpal be'u bsnams //
T02D2942:19a-36: 'joms byed dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D2942:19a-37: gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19a-38: lho phyogs rgyas pa ser mo'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D2942:19a-39: rgyas pa sngon mo phyag na padma bsnams //
T02D2942:19a-40: 'od ldan mthid ga phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams //
T02D2942:19b-0: gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs @19b su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-1: nub phyogs padma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D2942:19b-2: dkar sham dmar mo phyag na gdu bu bsnams //
T02D2942:19b-3: mdangs can dmar mo phyag na bum pa bsnams //
T02D2942:19b-4: gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-5: byang phyogs phrin las drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D2942:19b-6: yid gzhungs ltar gu phyag na bud dung bsnams //
T02D2942:19b-7: yid bzangs ljang ser phyag na g-yung drung bsnams //
T02D2942:19b-8: gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-9: phyogs skyong 'jig rten dbang ldan dang //
T02D2942:19b-10: thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dgyes ba che //
T02D2942:19b-11: brgya byin dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:19b-12: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-13: sbyin sreg bdag po dka' thub ral pa can //
T02D2942:19b-14: drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:19b-15: me yi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:19b-16: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du sbyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:19b-17: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-18: bdud gcod bdud la mnga' mdzad bdud kyi rje //
T02D2942:19b-19: bdud gcod 'chi bdag mang po kun gyi gtso //
T02D2942:19b-20: gshin rje'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:19b-21: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:19b-22: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-23: thod rgal 'jigs pa chen po'i skyabs mdzad pa //
T02D2942:19b-24: nad gdong mdangs 'phrog srin po kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:19b-25: srin po'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:19b-26: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:19b-27: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-28: char sprin lo tog chu la dbang byed pa //
T02D2942:19b-29: lha chen chu lha snyem pa kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:19b-30: chu lha'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:19b-31: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:19b-32: 'gro ba'i don du mchod ching gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-33: srog 'chang dbugs kyi bdag po dbugs kyi gzungs //
T02D2942:19b-34: srog 'chang rlung lha rig 'dzin kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:19b-35: rlung lha rig 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:19b-36: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:19b-37: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:19b-38: nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gtor mnga' ba //
T02D2942:19b-39: gter sbyin gter 'chang mang po kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:19b-40: gnod sbyin rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:20a-1: ba bsrung ba'i slang du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:20a-2: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-3: bgegs la mnga' mdzad dngos grub mchog ston pa //
T02D2942:20a-4: log 'dren tshar gcod lha rnams kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:20a-5: bgegs kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:20a-6: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:20a-7: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-8: 'od chen 'jig rten gling bzhir snang mdzad pa //
T02D2942:20a-9: gza' skar stong gi lha mang kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:20a-10: lha yi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:20a-11: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:20a-12: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-13: sa la mnga' mdzad sa bdag kun gyi rje //
T02D2942:20a-14: sa yi lha mo brtan ma yang //
T02D2942:20a-15: bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D2942:20a-16: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-17: gnyis med don la rig pa shar mdzad cing //
T02D2942:20a-18: thugs dam rgyud bskul lcags kyu phyogs bcur 'bar ;
T02D2942:20a-19: / zhi ba bdud bzhi 'dul mdzad dkar mo'i sku //
T02D2942:20a-20: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-21: yon tan rgyas pa gser 'od 'od zer 'phro //
T02D2942:20a-22: log 'dren bgegs 'ching zhags pa phyogs bcur 'phen //
T02D2942:20a-23: yon tan tshogs rgyas 'ching byed zhags pa ma //
T02D2942:20a-24: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-25: thams cad dbang sdud dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom //
T02D2942:20a-26: grub pa sdud cing 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sdom //
T02D2942:20a-27: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lcags sgrog ma //
T02D2942:20a-28: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-29: sna tshogs las las grub pa'i ljang gu dgyes //
T02D2942:20a-30: bde gshegs tshogs mnyes mchod pa'i dril bu 'bar //
T02D2942:20a-31: las dang nyon mongs bdud 'dul thal byed ma //
T02D2942:20a-32: 'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol //
T02D2942:20a-33: dza: h'um bam ho: ae hye hi bha ga b'a na /
T02D2942:20a-34: ma h'a ka ru ni ka ya dri shya ho //
T02D2942:20a-41: de nas gnyis su med bar bstim pa dang //
T02D2942:20a-42: ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyer med bsres //
T02D2942:20a-43: brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni //
T02D2942:20a-44: h'um rin chen sna bzhi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir //
T02D2942:20a-45: ma chags padma 'bum gyi gdan bting ste //
T02D2942:20a-46: rin chen khri dang nyi zla gsal ba'i rgyan //
T02D2942:20b-0: dngos su @20b 'byor dang yid kyis rnam sprul te //
T02D2942:20b-1: bdag cag dad pa'i yid kyis mngon sprul te //
T02D2942:20b-2: rim bzhin bde yangs nyid du bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2942:20b-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs ni rab tu rgya che ste //
T02D2942:20b-7: 'gro ba kun la khyab mdzad rdo rje rnam 'joms nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:20b-9: phyogs bcu'i khro bo rgyal ba rnams //
T02D2942:20b-10: nyon mongs dug gsum sdug bsngal gyis //
T02D2942:20b-11: gzir ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa //
T02D2942:20b-12: phrin las drag po'i dregs pas 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D2942:20b-13: phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:20b-15: phyogs bzhi dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi //
T02D2942:20b-16: srid rtse rin chen mtha' yas nas //
T02D2942:20b-17: dri med bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa'i //
T02D2942:20b-18: phyogs bzhi'i yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:20b-20: phyogs kyi lha mo bkra shis brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D2942:20b-21: thugs mchog 'gro don ma lus bdud las rgyal //
T02D2942:20b-22: thugs rjes dbang bskur chos sgra shes rab thabs //
T02D2942:20b-23: mi mthun phyogs la yon tan bkra shis pa //
T02D2942:20b-24: bkra shis lha mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:20b-26: phyogs bcu 'dul ba'i dbang phyug sku sprul ba //
T02D2942:20b-27: phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams mang po tshar gcod cing //
T02D2942:20b-28: mtho ris gnas nas 'khor los sgyur mdzad pa //
T02D2942:20b-29: phyogs skyong chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:20b-31: tshad med bzhi po mthar phyin lhun grub rtags //
T02D2942:20b-32: phyag rgya bzhi yi dang du thugs rjes sprul //
T02D2942:20b-33: 'gro drug sems can gnas nas sprul mdzad pa'i //
T02D2942:20b-34: sgo skyong 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2942:20b-35: de nas mchod pa lnga phul te /
T02D2942:20b-37: cho ga ji ltar 'dod bzhin brtsam //
T02D2942:20b-38: de rjes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la //
T02D2942:20b-39: bstod pa nyid ni 'di skad dbul //
T02D2942:20b-40: h'um bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms //
T02D2942:20b-42: ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong //
T02D2942:20b-43: de nyid sgrib pa sel mdzad pa //
T02D2942:20b-45: shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs ma brgyad //
T02D2942:20b-46: nang gi snying po rdo rje gtso //
T02D2942:20b-47: dpa' bo thub pa bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2942:20b-48: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang //
T02D2942:20b-49: phrin las bzhi yi khyad par dgyi //
T02D2942:21a-2: rol mo sil snyan rnams kyis mchod //
T02D2942:21a-3: rin chen stegs bu 'di dag ni //
T02D2942:21a-4: gru bzhir ldan zhing sgo bzhi gdong //
T02D2942:21a-5: dbus kyi padma ge sar la //
T02D2942:21a-6: bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms //
T02D2942:21a-8: rgya gram phyogs med thugs kar 'dzin//
T02D2942:21a-9: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-10: shar phyogs gtso bo mtha' yas ni //
T02D2942:21a-12: phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te //
T02D2942:21a-13: rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2942:21a-14: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-15: shar lho khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil //

T02D2942:21a-19: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-20: lho phyogs khro bo gnod mdzes ni //
T02D2942:21a-22: phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te //
T02D2942:21a-23: rdo rje tho ba thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2942:21a-24: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-25: lho nub khro bo mi g-yo mgon //
T02D2942:21a-27: phyag drug rdo rje dbyug to thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2942:21a-28: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-29: nub phyogs khro bo rta mgrin ni //
T02D2942:21a-32: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul ;
T02D2942:21a-33: / byang phyogs gtum po dbang phyug ni //
T02D2942:21a-35: phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te //
T02D2942:21a-36: rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2942:21a-37: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-38: byang shar gshin rje gshed po ni //

T02D2942:21a-42: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-43: shar phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor srung //
T02D2942:21a-45: phyag mtshan phyag na ne le bsnams //
T02D2942:21a-46: de la bstod de mchog pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-47: lho phyogs rgyal po 'phags skyes po //
T02D2942:21a-49: phyag mtshan phyag na pi wang bsnams //
T02D2942:21a-50: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21a-51: nub phyogs rgyal po spyan mi bzang //
T02D2942:21a-53: phyag mtshan phyag na chu srin bsnams //
T02D2942:21a-54: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-0: byang phyogs rgyal po rnam @21b thos sras //
T02D2942:21b-2: phyag mtshan phyag na dong tse brtsegs //
T02D2942:21b-3: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-4: shar phyogs lha mo dkar sham ma //
T02D2942:21b-6: phyag na bkra shis gdugs 'dzin cing //
T02D2942:21b-7: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-8: shar smad lha mo dbyangs mkhan ma //
T02D2942:21b-10: phyag na bkra shis 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-11: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-12: lho stong lha mo mdangs can ma //
T02D2942:21b-15: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-16: lho smad lha mo 'od ldan ma //
T02D2942:21b-18: phyag na bkra shis rgyal mtshan bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-19: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-20: nub stod lha mo skyes chen ma //
T02D2942:21b-22: phyag na bkra shis bum pa bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-23: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-24: nub smad lha mo dri ma med //
T02D2942:21b-26: phyag na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-27: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-28: byang stod lha mo yid bzangs ma //
T02D2942:21b-30: phyag na bkra shis bud dung bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-31: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-32: byang smad lha mo yid gzhungs ma //
T02D2942:21b-34: phyag na gser gyi nya mo bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-35: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-36: shar phyogs lta dbang brgya byin ni //
T02D2942:21b-38: phyag na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-39: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul//
T02D2942:21b-40: shar lho drang srong me lha ni //
T02D2942:21b-42: phyag na rin chen phreng ba bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-43: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-44: lho phyogs gshin rje'i rgyal po ni //
T02D2942:21b-46: phyag na gshin rje'i dbyug to bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-47: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul ;
T02D2942:21b-48: / lho nub srin po bden bral ni //
T02D2942:21b-50: phyag na ral gri rnon po bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-51: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:21b-52: nub phyogs chu lha'i bdag po ni //
T02D2942:21b-54: phyag na klu yi zhags pa bsnams //
T02D2942:21b-55: de la bstod de mchod pa /
T02D2942:22a-1: / nub byang rlung lha dbang ldan ni //
T02D2942:22a-3: phyag na rin chen be con bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-4: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-5: byang phyogs gnod sbyin ku be ra //
T02D2942:22a-7: phyag na gnod sbyin dbyug pa 'dzin //
T02D2942:22a-8: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-9: byang shar dbang ldan bgegs kyi bdag / sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'bar //
T02D2942:22a-10: phyag na tri sh'u la rtse gsum bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-11: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-12: steng phyogs nyi zla tshangs pa ni //
T02D2942:22a-14: phyag na autpa la 'bar ba rnams //
T02D2942:22a-15: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-16: 'og phyogs sa yi lha mo ni //
T02D2942:22a-18: phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-19: de la bstod de mchod ba 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-20: shar sgo'i rdo rje lcags kyu ma //
T02D2942:22a-22: phyag mtshan phyag na lcags kyu bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-23: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-24: lho sgo rdo rje zhags pa ma //
T02D2942:22a-26: phyag mtshan phyag na zhags pa bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-27: de la bstod de mchod ba 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-28: nub phyogs rdo rje lcags sgrog ma //
T02D2942:22a-30: phyag mtshan phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-31: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-32: byang phyogs rdo rje dril bu ma //
T02D2942:22a-34: phyag mtshan phyag na dril bu bsnams //
T02D2942:22a-35: de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2942:22a-36: de la dbang bskur cho ga las //
T02D2942:22a-37: ji ltar gsungs pa'i dbang rnams sbyin //
T02D2942:22a-38: bzod gsol smon lam gdab pa nyid //
T02D2942:22a-39: de nas lha rnams so so yi //
T02D2942:22a-40: thugs ka'i sa bon la bsdus te //
T02D2942:22a-41: gshegs gsol dmigs med rgyas btab la //
T02D2942:22a-42: de nas dga' ston dbugs phyung ste //
T02D2942:22a-43: rig pa'i las dang gzengs yang bstod //
T02D2942:22a-44: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs te //
T02D2942:22a-45: mgon po'i gtor ma btang ba ni //
T02D2942:22a-46: sngags kyis spyan drangs ye shes gzhug / pam las gyur pa so so yi //
T02D2942:22a-47: sku mdog phyag mtshan so sor dmigs //
T02D2942:22a-49: de yi sngags ni 'di dag bzlas //
T02D2942:22a-50: rdo rje lce las yang dag phyung //
T02D2942:22a-51: aom ae hye hi ha na ha na bhinda badzra h'um phat /
T02D2942:22b-0: aom ae hye hi badzr'a @22b na la bhinda na
T02D2942:22b-1: manda la buddha sarba bhasmi ku ru sarba dusht'am h'um
T02D2942:22b-2: phat / ao ae hye hi badzr'a k'a la danda ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D2942:22b-3: aom ae hye hi badzra ki ri ti stam raksha sa de ba ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:22b-4: aom ae hya hi n'a ga badzra a'a na ya sarba dha na dha n+ya /
T02D2942:22b-5: sarba nam ni mukt'a lam ka ra dha ra sarba n'a ga nar ni tsa badzradha ra ya /
T02D2942:22b-6: sa ma y'a ma nu sm'a ra aa kaddhya aa
T02D2942:22b-7: ka ddhya bandha bandha ha ra ha ra pra na
T02D2942:22b-8: na ma h'a tstshe da h'um phat /
T02D2942:22b-9: aom ae hye hi badzra aa ni la ma h'a bee ga //
T02D2942:22b-10: a'a na ya sarba du sht'am h'um phat /
T02D2942:22b-11: aom ae hye hi ku be ra yaksh'a dhi ba ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:22b-12: aom ae hye hi dhi dhu bhi na badzra sh'u la sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:22b-13: aom ae hye hi na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2942:22b-14: aom phri nyi bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:22b-15: aom ae hye hi na ma: sa manta buddha na ma:/
T02D2942:22b-16: he sho dya pra to dzyo ti ra m'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2942:22b-17: lha rnams so so'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2942:22b-18: mchod yon la sogs gtor ma la //
T02D2942:22b-19: sngags ni bdun tsam cig dag gis //
T02D2942:22b-20: nges par 'bul dang bstabs par bya'o //
T02D2942:22b-21: de nas mgon po mnyes pa yi //
T02D2942:22b-22: tshig 'dir rnams kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2942:22b-23: h'um lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D2942:22b-24: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02D2942:22b-25: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D2942:22b-26: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D2942:22b-27: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa yang //
T02D2942:22b-28: bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
T02D2942:22b-29: thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol ba 'debs //
T02D2942:22b-30: gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig / dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D2942:22b-31: lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la /
T02D2942:22b-32: mchod bar bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:22b-33: me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha //
T02D2942:22b-34: 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / shar lho gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:22b-35: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:22b-36: gshin rje be tson 'chang ba'i lha //
T02D2942:22b-37: ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:22b-38: mchod bar bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:22b-39: bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha //
T02D2942:22b-40: srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / lho nub gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:22b-41: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:22b-42: zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha //
T02D2942:22b-43: klu yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:22b-44: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:22b-45: rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02D2942:23a-0: @23a * // rig 'dzin rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / nub byang gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:23a-1: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:23a-2: gnod sbyin lag na dbyug to thogs //
T02D2942:23a-3: nor srung rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / byang phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:23a-4: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:23a-5: dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha //
T02D2942:23a-6: bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / byang shar gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02D2942:23a-7: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:23a-8: steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang //
T02D2942:23a-9: nyi ma zla ba gza' chen po //
T02D2942:23a-10: gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la//
T02D2942:23a-11: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:23a-12: 'og gi klu ste sa yi lha //
T02D2942:23a-13: sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste //
T02D2942:23a-14: dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la //
T02D2942:23a-15: mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2942:23a-16: shar gyi phyogs nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas / gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02D2942:23a-17: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag / chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang //
T02D2942:23a-18: dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po lha dang ni //
T02D2942:23a-19: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02D2942:23a-20: lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang //
T02D2942:23a-21: ri yi lha rnams gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas //
T02D2942:23a-22: so so so sor phul ba 'di dag kun //
T02D2942:23a-23: so so so so'i phyogs su bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2942:23a-24: sde dang dpung bcas bu smad 'khor bcas dang //
T02D2942:23a-25: gtor ma bdug pa me tog bdug spos rnams //
T02D2942:23a-26: rab tu dgyes nas bzhes te bsnams nas gsol //
T02D2942:23a-27: de nas 'byung po bgegs la yang //
T02D2942:23a-28: gtor ma dag ni sbyin par bya //
T02D2942:23a-29: h'um 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02D2942:23a-30: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi yul gnas dang //
T02D2942:23a-31: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang //
T02D2942:23a-32: ri rnams kun la gang dag gnas ba dang //
T02D2942:23a-33: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang //
T02D2942:23a-34: rin chen gnas na gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02D2942:23a-35: rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma lteng ka dang //
T02D2942:23a-36: khron pa dang ni ngam grog chu mig dang //
T02D2942:23a-37: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang /
T02D2942:23a-38: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02D2942:23a-39: gang dag gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang //
T02D2942:23a-40: mu stegs spyi gnas drang srong sde gnas dang //
T02D2942:23b-0: gtsug lag khang chu glang chen khang pa @23b dang //
T02D2942:23b-1: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02D2942:23b-2: srang dang khyams dang grong gi 'dun sa dang //
T02D2942:23b-3: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig dang //
T02D2942:23b-4: dur khrod dag dang nags tshal chen po dang //
T02D2942:23b-5: seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas rnams dang //
T02D2942:23b-6: dgon pa nags chen rab tu 'jigs pa dang //
T02D2942:23b-7: gling ma bzang po dag na gang gnas dang //
T02D2942:23b-8: rab tu dgyes shing go go gnas rnams su //
T02D2942:23b-9: me tog phreng ba byug spos bdug pa dang /
T02D2942:23b-10: bstod dang mar me gtor ma gus 'bul bas //
T02D2942:23b-11: 'di dag bzhes nas so sor gnas nas gsol //
T02D2942:23b-12: bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D2942:23b-13: de nas rigs drug so so'i gtor ma gtang //
T02D2942:23b-14: dbang rdzogs bkra shis smon lam gdab //
T02D2942:23b-15: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba mkhas pas brtsam //
T02D2942:23b-16: khrus kyi cho ga ji lta bar //
T02D2942:23b-17: khrus byas rol mo'i las bya'o //
T02D2942:23b-18: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
